title: Slow-Cooker Family-Favorite Chili
directions: In 12-inch skillet, cook beef and onion over medium heat 8 to 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until beef is brown; drain.
In 4- to 5-quart slow cooker, mix beef, onion and remaining ingredients.
Cover and cook on Low heat setting 6 to 8 hours.
ingredients: 2 lb lean (at least 80%) ground beef Save $
1 can (28 oz) diced tomatoes, undrained Save $
1 can (16 oz) chili beans in sauce, undrained Save $
